title: added 'assemble-docs' makefile target
body: new target is to simplify build server configuration to deploy API docs to https://developer.xamarin.com/api/namespace/SkiaSharp/

comments.author: joelmartinez
comments.body: If you're curious, yes I saw that `update-docs` also assembles the deployment artifacts ... but the reason I wanted a separate target that only assembles, is because `mdoc update` will modify the XML files if the resulting assembly is different ... and thus, these changes would need to be checked in. I didn't want the build server having to deal with that ... `update-docs` should be run separately, by a user that will check in the XML changes :)

comments.author: joelmartinez
comments.body: @migueldeicaza when you get a chance ... this is for the teamcity build :)
